description:
Events and festivals are embracing sustainable event management policies but it remains a daunting task to actually implement these policies. In this workshop you will learn what it means to make your event more sustainable and what goes into an Environmental Plan. It's not just about recycling...

This 1 hour long workshop is divided in 3 sections:

1. What is sustainable event management

2. Your environmental plan

3. Your audience

Interviews with event and festival professionals will provide you with practical advice. What did the festival Lightning in a Bottle do to win the 'Outstanding-Award' for their sustainable efforts? Besides interview the workshop consist of tutorials, presentations, and reading material.

We will discuss subjects such as:

* travel & transport

* vendor and contractor policies

* waste management

* triple bottom line

* and the cost of going 'green'

The workshop will supplemented by regular discussions on the discussion board.
title: Sustainable event management in 8 easy steps
